mod.name: Arcane Archer
mod.description: Combines the power of archery and magic.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Long Shot
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
ALL enemies lose 2 Strength this turn.

cards.name: Long Shot+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
ALL enemies lose 3 Strength this turn.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Bleeding Arrow
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Apply 1 arcanearcher:Shred.

cards.name: Bleeding Arrow+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Apply 2 arcanearcher:Shred.

cards.name: Crushing Fist
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Apply 3 arcanearcher:Shred.
Apply 3 arcanearcher:Shrink.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Crushing Fist+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Apply 3 arcanearcher:Shred.
Apply 3 arcanearcher:Shrink.

cards.name: Fire Arrow
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Fire Arrow+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Frost Arrow
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Apply 1 Weak.

cards.name: Frost Arrow+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Apply 2 Weak.

cards.name: Identify
cards.description: Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile 2 times.

cards.name: Identify+
cards.description: Put a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile 3 times.

cards.name: Leaping Arrow
cards.description:
Gain 3 Block.
( arcanearcher:Momentum: Gain 3 Block again.)
Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Leaping Arrow+
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
( arcanearcher:Momentum: Gain 6 Block again.)
Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Mind Ray
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your hand + 0.
(Deals 0 damage.)

cards.name: Mind Ray+
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your hand + 2.
(Deals 0 damage.)

cards.description: Next turn, deal 11 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Raining Shafts+

cards.name: Rest+

cards.name: Snecko Mask+
cards.description: Snecko. Gain 10 Block. Apply 1 Vulnerable to each enemy that attacks you this turn.

cards.name: Speed
cards.description: Gain 2 temporary Dexterity.

cards.name: Speed+

cards.description:
ALL enemies lose 3 Strength this turn.
( arcanearcher:Momentum: Draw 3 cards.)

cards.name: Sprint+
cards.description:
ALL enemies lose 4 Strength this turn.

cards.name: Stop Drop Roll

cards.name: Stop Drop Roll+
cards.description: Gain 6 Block. At the start of your next 2 turns, gain 6 Block.

cards.name: Acid Rain
cards.description: Lose 6 HP. Apply 6 Poison to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Acid Rain+
cards.description: Lose 3 HP. Apply 6 Poison to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Aim
cards.description: An Attack in your hand costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.

cards.description: An Attack in your hand costs 0 this turn.

cards.description:
Add 2 random Attacks into your hand. They cost 0 this turn.
arcanearcher:Hoard.

Snecko.

cards.name: Bolt of Wonder+
cards.description:
Snecko.
In a random (1-3) number of turns, deal a random (1- 99) amount of damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Catch Arrows
cards.description: Whenever you are attacked this turn, draw a card.

cards.name: Catch Arrows+
cards.description: Whenever you are attacked this turn, draw a card.

cards.name: Clairvoyance
cards.description: Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. Scry 6.

cards.name: Clairvoyance+
cards.description: Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile. Scry 8.

cards.name: Color Spray
cards.description: Apply 1 random debuff to each enemy.

cards.name: Color Spray+

relics.name: Pre-igniter
relics.description: At the start of your first combat, obtain up to 4 Flame potions.
relics.flavorText: I have come to bring fire on the earth, and how I wish it were already kindled! - Luke 12:49
